# NSHighResolutionCapable

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value indicating whether the Cocoa app supports high-resolution displays.

## Graphics

- **UIAppSupportsHDR**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app supports HDR mode on Apple TV 4K.
- **NSSupportsAutomaticGraphicsSwitching**: A Boolean value indicating whether an OpenGL app may utilize the integrated GPU.
- **GPUEjectPolicy**: The preferred system action when an external GPU is connected from the system.
- **GPUSelectionPolicy**: The app’s preference for whether it wants to use external graphics processors.
